context_bundle.summary: Clean root + NetHunter install for Samsung S10 5G (G977B/beyondx). Critical: Root with Magisk BEFORE TWRP. Recovery partition boot model. Use Magisk 28.1 not 29.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. Unlock bootloader (OEM Unlock + Download Mode + Vol Up confirm). 2. Patch AP with Magisk 28.1 on phone. 3. Odin flash: BL+CP+patched_AP+CSC. 4. Install Magisk app, Direct Install. 5. Patch TWRP with Magisk, flash via Odin. 6. TWRP: Format Data, flash DM-Verity disabler, flash NetHunter zip, reflash Magisk.
common_patterns: Boot root: Power+Bixby+VolUp release at warning
Firmware: SamFirm or Frija to download
known_errors: TWRP before root = brick risk on S10
os_patch_level mismatch = PIN lock after kernel flash - use backtothefuture zip
